channel.title: Home on Datum, I'm Adam
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Datum, I'm Adam

item.title: Hi There
item.description: My name’s Adam Garcia. I’m currently working as a data analyst in New York. My training and work have primarily been in public health research, with a focus on biostatistics and epidemiology. I also dabble in data science and web development. I’m deeply passionate about health equity and social justice and I strive to tell meaningful stories through data. If you’d like to get in touch, I’d love to chat: you can find me on LinkedIn and Twitter, or you can drop an e-mail to hi@adam-garcia.
